text.0: adhvaryu on the filter pour the soma juice expressed with stones.
text.1: and make it pure for indras drink.
text.2: pour out for indra thunderarmed the milk of heaven the somas juice.
text.3: most excellent most rich in sweets.
text.4: these gods and all the marut host indu enjoy this juice of thine.
text.6: for soma thou hast been effused strengthening for the wild carouse.
text.7: o steer the singer for our help.
text.8: flow with thy stream farsighted one effused into the cleansing sieve.
text.9: flow on to give us strength and fame.
